What is Flare Capsule?

Flare Capsule is a project on the Flare Network that enables you to store a fixed number of tokens as a "capsule". The capsule can only be opened after it reaches maturity.

What is the purpose of Flare Capsule?

Flare Capsule helps you to send tokens as gifts to your loved ones, including yourselves, that they receive on a fixed date, say their birthday or anniversary. It could be anything from your kid's 18th birthday to a gift from the Present You to the Future You in case you're bad at HODLing.

What is in it for the ecosystem?

Flare Capsule is about enabling the users to see the potential of Flare in the long run, and affirm their belief in the long-term growth of Flare by creating such capsules for their friends, family, and themselves. It focuses on mass adoption of Flare, bringing the casual and unitiated crowd into the crypto world in general, and the Flare Ecosystem in specific.

How does it work?

Just pick the amount to lock and the duration, and that's it! The minimum amount is 0.01 FLR and the minimum lock-in period is 2 months.

Can I cancel my capsule?

No! Since that would defeat the purpose of Flare Capsules.

Which wallets are supported?

Flare Capsules currently supports only MetaMask. It will automatically redirect you to switch to the Flare testnet network. With time, depending on the response, other wallets that support Flare Network will be added.

Is this free?

Yes, Flare Capsules does NOT take a chunk of the deposited amount as service charge. And never will.

Can I have multiple capsules to my name?

Yes! There is no limit. Create and receive all the capsules you can!

How are the funds distributed?

The Flare Capsule Smart Contract has a distribute() function that anyone can call. It checks for all Flare Capsules that mature on the given day to the day the last distribute run happened, and releases their funds. It can be called once a day to ensure people don't lose gas fee by calling it for no reason.

How is this different from staking?

Most forms of staking allow you to back out if you're experiencing the Paper Hand Syndrome. But a Flare Capsule lock is immutable and unchangeable. Also, unlike staking, the capsules don't promise an interest but simply reflect time-bound gifts from the past you to yourself or others in the present. They represent the belief that the Flare tokens of tomorrow would mean more than the Flare tokens of today.

Nice, where do I sign?

Just click on the "Create Capsule" button on the home page. It's super intuitive and easy.



Note: Flare Capsules is owned by The Dark Sun Labs, not affiliated to the Flare Network team. We do NOT have any say in the price movement of the FLR token, and hence cannot guarantee that the value of the tokens would always be more in USDT than it was at the time of capsule creation.
